original_text: But whenever you enter a town and they do not receive you, go into its streets and say,
korean_text: 어느 동네에 들어가든지 너희를 영접하지 아니하거든 그 거리로 나와서 말하되

sentences.original_text: But whenever you enter a town
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 너희가 어떤 동네에 들어갈 때에

sentences.original_text: and they do not receive you,
